name: Yingying Zhu 0004
content: Yingying Zhu's Homepage YINGYING ZHU Assistant Professor Computer Science, University of Texas at Arlington Arlington TX Email: yingying dot zhu at uta dot edu Google Scholar | Papers |Course I am working in the Computer Science and Engineering Department, University of Texas at Arlington as an assistant professor. I work on AI for Science and Medicine (AI4SM) to developing AI tools for analysising medical data and solving basic biomedical science problems. contact: yingying.zhu@uta.edu News Aug 2024, we get two papers publised by my PhD students in Medical Imaging Analysis and IEEE Transaction on Medical Imaging! We also released two benchmark medical vision language benchmark datasets! Aug. 2023, we released a new large scale medical imaging difference VQA dataset and published the paper in KDD 2023! Project Page Download Jan. 2022, Served as Reviewer of MICCAI 2022! Dec. 2021, One paper accepted by Medical Image Analysis! Oct. 2021 One paper accepted by BMVC 2021! Oct. 2021, One paper accepted by EMNLP 2021! Sep. 2021, Served as Senior PC member of AAAI 2022! July, 2021, We are organizing CVPR 2021 Tutorial on Medical Imaging Analysis!
